roleset.name: give credentials
roleset.note: ACCREDIT-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. Member of VN class patent-101. (from accredit.01-v)

example.name: accredit-v: passive, arg1 and arg2
example.text: There is Jiakun Liu who [*T*-7] was accredited [*-8] as an " excellent member of the Communist Party " of the province and a " labor model of the entire country " , acting as the Party branch secretary .
example.arg: as an " excellent member of the Communist Party " of the province and a " labor model of the entire country "
